verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
VERSE:
He is risen from the grave
Undefeated, Jesus reigns
With all power in His name
He is over all, Oh
He is over all, Oh

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
VERSE 2:
At the mention of His name
Captivated, all proclaim
There's no limit to His reign
He is over all, Oh
He is over all, Oh

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
Christ supreme the nations bow
Our hearts adore as we cry out
Hosanna in the highest
Jesus is the greatest

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
VERSE 3:
Veiled in glory, robed in light
All surpassing is His might
Christ our Saviour, lifted high
He is over all, Oh
He is over all, Oh

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
Christ supreme the nations bow
Our hearts adore as we cry out
Hosanna in the highest
Over all Your kingdom reigns
The earth resounds with Jesus' praise
Hosanna in the highest
Jesus is the greatest

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
BRIDGE:
All praise, all praise
The power of Jesus' name
All hail, all hail
The name over every name
